title: Ticket #2236: job_ckpt_standalone_std fails on some crosstest platforms
description:
The job_ckpt_standalone_std is failing on:
  • x86_ ubuntu_10.04
  • x86 64_ubuntu_10.04
  • x86 64_sles_9

This is not a new issue, it has been happening in the trunk for a few months, at least. I talked with Pete Keller and he said that it is not important to fix before the 7.7.0 release, but we should fix it for a future release.

http://nmi-s006.cs.wisc.edu/results/Test-history.php?branch=trunk&test=job_ckpt_standalone_std-1
creator: kronenfe
